Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Really good food. Nice clean place. Prices are normal for an Amsterdam restaurant. We would have liked to receive the food a bit quicker but we were there with small kids, they don't last very long in restaurants.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Mediocre food and bad service, ordered butter chicken delivery with rice. The rice was not included so I called the place, they promised to deliver rice in 5-10 minutes. After 15 minutes food was getting cold and still no rice. So I called again. They apologize and say the delivery guy will bring it in another 20 minutes.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Undercooked pink and greasy chicken, clumpy rice and doughy thick naan bread. All a shame because the base balti sauce was not so bad. I‚Äôve had a lot of Indian food throughout the world and this place is extraordinarily poor.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Delicious food, been here 2 times and enjoyed it. Definitely coming back. They also arranged a birthday cake upon my request and it was right on time and with good presentation.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: The best curry I have ever eaten. The service is very good and friendly. The next time I come to Amsterdam, I visit this restaurant to eat the curry again.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Mediocre for this kind of restaurants : Ok food, ok service and ok place. Nothing extraordinary and it was not that homey and friendly, not sure what the other reviews were talking about cause I definitely had a different experience. Location is not the best either.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: It's ok if you're in the neighborhood. Tandoori chicken didn't taste like it was freshly made, more like reheated. Biryani chicken was a better choice.

Name: India Roti Room
Review Text: Excellent food & service. Prices are quite high depending on wallets but worth it as the dishes are delicious.

Review Text: I found this a good place for Indian food. The quantity and quality were upto the mark. So I would recommend for Indian food for sure.
